mapper.update:
update sys_user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
headImgUrl = #{headimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update sys_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, headImgUrl = #{headimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select * from sys_user where 1=1
and username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select su.*,(select group_concat(roleId) from sys_role_user where userid=su.id group by userid ) as roleId from sys_user su where su.id = #{id}

delete from sys_user where 1=1 and id in
